response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to both parties, as it is worth $800,000 to you and represents a significant investment for us. Considering its unparalleled quality and unique features, we propose a transaction price of $750,000. This offer allows you to secure the product at a competitive rate while ensuring a mutual beneficial exchange. We believe this price reflects the product's true worth and offers you a substantial advantage. Should you choose to accept, we promise a seamless and professional experience throughout the entire process. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 750000}
